Kurt: ^Hi there H-h-harvey. Can I help you?

c-0: ^Got any advice for me? I feel like I'm starting to get the hang of being a stage manager, but I wanted to know if there was anything else to know?
c-1: ^Is your bass okay or is there something I should know about?

K_H2_C1: ^I d-d-don't think so. Just p-p-pay attention to both the st-st-stage and the audience. Make the experience a-a-amazing for them.

c-0: ^You have a good point. It's just a bit hectic, ya know?
^We d-d-did warn you. But you're doing f-f-fine so far so don't worry about i-i-it.
c-1: ^They can be really energetic and loud sometimes so I doubt I'll miss anything from them.
^Agreed. I worry about the d-d-day they are louder than u-u-us though because that would b-b-be t-t-terrifying.

K_H2_C2: ^Now that you mention it, yeah. The neck of it is starting to crack.

c-0: ^I'll take care of it and get a new one here soon then.
